titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on formulations of Prosulfuron.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/10/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on preparations containing Prosulfuron Technical (1-(4-methoxy-6-methyltriazin-2-yl)-3-(2-(3,3,3-trifluoropropyl)-phenyls ulfonyl) urea.
